oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Authorisation of inputs for EU organic farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Speiser, Bernhard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Inputs used in organic farming are carefully regulated by organic standards. Organic inputs are also controlled by laws covering agriculture in general. Recent revisions in the EU Regulation have made some changes to recent revisions and these are highlighted below.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Speiser, Bernhard (2007) Authorisation of inputs for EU organic farming. The Organic Standard (70), pp. 10-11.
